Question
========
A research on the time that youngsters spend on social media (measured
in minutes per day) is carried out using a random sample (N=300). In
this sample, the mean equals 192 minutes per day and the standard
deviation 30 minutes per day.  
  
The variable of interest follows a normal distribution. According to the
Empirical Rule, we can say that approximately...

Answerlist
----------
* 68% of the observations are between 162 and 222.
* 68% of the observations are between 188 and 196.
* 95% of the observations are between 182 and 200.
* 95% of the observations are between 170 and 214.
